AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Legacy holder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]’s early life was spent mostly in debtor’s prison because [PAWN_possessive] poor dad could not pay off. The whole family had to join him in the slammer - a fairly typical practice in Slug Home Nebula. [PAWN_nameDef] developed repeated infections in such a bad hygiene conditions environment. It disrupted [PAWN_possessive] natural dew exsudation that usually works as an immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] ended up getting parasitised. [PAWN_pronoun] inner garden grew up.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dry hearted
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was a pitiful one. [PAWN_possessive] father died of stomach cancer(not fun for a gasteropod) and left his family penniless due to his gambling. [PAWN_nameDef] was often made fun of in school for [PAWN_possessive] studiousness and skin dryness, but nobody could have predicted [PAWN_nameDef]'s rise to power.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vacuum hater
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] almost lost an eye being sucked by a vacuum cleaner. Focusing on going outside to dodge the terrifying monster favorised mucosa exsudation. It's because of the wind. Ask Shai-Hulud it knows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Inner brain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother was never able to get through the thick and thin with [PAWN_nameDef]'s father. He was tyrannical and had unorthodox sexual desires. That's what [PAWN_nameDef]'s mother relied on when she laid her eggs inside him. [PAWN_nameDef] and siblings devoured their host. [PAWN_nameDef] told later to her brood that [PAWN_nameDef]'s father did not die like that. Or if so that was an accident, or maybe he deserved it. [PAWN_nameDef] inherited some tastes and predispositions from that family crunchy story.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Theater prodigy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: When [PAWN_nameDef] used to be in the transrace nursery, [PAWN_pronoun] was part of theater piece where a Zoltan embodied Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer from the terran subculture. The Zoltan was bullied by a young Mantis. [PAWN_nameDef] managed to mobilize his mindcontrol to make him stop. It worked and let [PAWN_nameDef] with soon to be dispersed guilty thoughts and a manipulative career seed within [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Offshore brood
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a very motivated drug mule and made it a career when others would dramatically die for some reason. He also had at least 2 families. When truth was revealed, [PAWN_nameDef]'s trust in men was devastated even if he was a loving one and always took care of his offshore brood(s).

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Socially awkward
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always felt awkward concerning [PAWN_possessive] morning dews. [PAWN_nameDef] cant bear being sighted when it happens and feels very vulnerable. That's why [PAWN_nameDef] chose to live as a night hermit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rotting outside
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a 'cherry on the cake' condition. Others say [PAWN_nameDef] smells weird, but hey, that's what moult is for.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spacepirate fanboy
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always dreamt to be a space pirate like Cobra, Harlock or Black Raven. [PAWN_nameDef] chose to let aside its race predispositions to live the dream, one day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Drool sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] has always felt [PAWN_possessive] excretions were great. Due to this, [PAWN_nameDef] began to mold them and to capture figures and craft opulent wares.
Because even with [PAWN_possessive] abundant morning dews, [PAWN_pronoun] was not able to gather enough drool to build [PAWN_possessive] dream statues, [PAWN_nameDef] became something of a recluse and a drool thief. [PAWN_possessive] behavior is only tolerated by the rest of the slugs because some fetish creeps will pay fortunes for thrumbo shaped slug snot.
